title: Bug 120216: Group dialog not showing when dataset is not set
description: When attempting to access the group dialog, an error is shown instead of the dialog.
OB: An error is shown when trying to access the group dialog.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Navigate to the group dialog. 
3. Verify if the dialog is displayed or if an error is shown instead.
